about_the_game:
In this digital escape room game, RealEscape, you'll face the chilling remnants of an abandoned facility. Every corner holds a secret, every shadow a threat. Can you solve the puzzles and uncover the grim history before it consumes you? Or will you become another lost soul in the endless maze?

An immersive 3D single player Escape Room game that includes:

  • Interactive environment for you to search and explore

  • Solve puzzles, utilize the objects around you, think outside the box and observe everything if you want to escape

The Lethe is calling. Will you answer?

  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620

short_description: Imagine being trapped where reality and fiction blur into a living nightmare. Welcome to The Lethe. Once a haven for society's most fragile minds, The Lethe became a playground for the sinister. They said it was a place of healing, but the truth was darker. Much darker...
